summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC. It details the charges incurred for a shipment, including transportation and special handling fees, and provides payment instructions and contact information for inquiries.

persons.name: Lauren Kvantner
persons.context: Lauren Kvantner is listed as the sender of a shipment associated with NYSG LLC.

persons.name: Ally Bier Martarianes
persons.context: Ally Bier Martarianes is mentioned as the recipient of the shipment sent by Lauren Kvantner.

persons.name: D. Ryan
persons.context: D. Ryan is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the shipment.

connections.description: Lauren Kvantner sent a shipment to Ally Bier Martarianes.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: An invoice was issued for the shipping services provided.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 11, 2004, and details charges totaling USD 20.03.
The shipment was picked up on June 3, 2004.
Lauren Kvantner is identified as the sender, while Ally Bier Martarianes is the recipient.
D. Ryan signed for the delivery of the shipment.
The invoice includes a discount of USD 11.10 applied to the total charges.
